verbose_text: Vulnerability is determined on the basis of a country 's exposure (average length of flood and drought events over areas with> 1% of the area in crop production) and sensitivity (amount of forest cover, rainfed land, and cereal crop yields per country) to climate related hazards and its adaptive capacity (socioeconomic indicators such as access to water, population growth rate, poverty, employment, etc).
evidence: amount of forest cover, rainfed land, and cereal crop
